verses.verse: Now <S%H4994><s%> will I <S%H7891>sing<s%> to my <S%H3039>well-beloved<s%> a <S%H7892>song<s%> of my <S%H1730>beloved<s%> touching his <S%H3754>vineyard.<s%> My <S%H3039>well-beloved<s%> <S%H1961>hath<s%> a <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> in a very fruitful <S%H1121>hill:<s%> <S%H8081><s%> <S%H7161><s%>

And he <S%H5823>fenced<s%> it, and gathered out the <S%H5619>stones<s%> thereof, and <S%H5193>planted<s%> it with the choicest <S%H8321>vine,<s%> and <S%H1129>built<s%> a <S%H4026>tower<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of it, and <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H2672>made<s%> a <S%H3342>winepress<s%> therein: and he <S%H6960>looked<s%> that it should bring <S%H6213>forth<s%> <S%H6025>grapes,<s%> and it brought <S%H6213>forth<s%> wild <S%H891>grapes.<s%>

And <S%H6258>now,<s%> O <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H8199>judge,<s%> I pray <S%H4994>you,<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> me and my <S%H3754>vineyard.<s%>

What <S%H4100><s%> could have been <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> to my <S%H3754>vineyard,<s%> that I have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6213>done<s%> in it? <S%H4069>wherefore,<s%> when I <S%H6960>looked<s%> that it should bring <S%H6213>forth<s%> <S%H6025>grapes,<s%> brought it <S%H6213>forth<s%> wild <S%H891>grapes?<s%>

And <S%H6258>now<s%> go to; I will <S%H3045>tell<s%> <S%H4994><s%> <S%H853>you<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> will <S%H6213>do<s%> to my <S%H3754>vineyard:<s%> I will take <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H4881>hedge<s%> thereof, and it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> eaten <S%H1197>up;<s%> and break <S%H6555>down<s%> the <S%H1447>wall<s%> thereof, and it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> trodden down: <S%H4823><s%>

And I will <S%H7896>lay<s%> it <S%H1326>waste:<s%> it shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H2167>pruned,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5737>digged;<s%> but there shall come <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H8068>briers<s%> and <S%H7898>thorns:<s%> I will also <S%H6680>command<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H5645>clouds<s%> that they rain no <S%H4480>rain<s%> <S%H4305><s%> <S%H4306><s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> it.

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> is the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> his <S%H8191>pleasant<s%> <S%H5194>plant:<s%> and he <S%H6960>looked<s%> for <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> but <S%H2009>behold<s%> <S%H4939>oppression;<s%> for <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> but <S%H2009>behold<s%> a <S%H6818>cry.<s%>

Woe <S%H1945><s%> unto them that <S%H5060>join<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> to <S%H1004>house,<s%> that <S%H7126>lay<s%> <S%H7704>field<s%> to <S%H7704>field,<s%> <S%H5704>till<s%> there be <S%H657>no<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> that they may be <S%H3427>placed<s%> <S%H905>alone<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of the <S%H776>earth!<s%>

In mine <S%H241>ears<s%> said the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> Of a <S%H518>truth<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1004>houses<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H8047>desolate,<s%> even <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H2896>fair,<s%> <S%H4480>without<s%> <S%H369><s%> <S%H3427>inhabitant.<s%>

Yea, <S%H3588><s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H6776>acres<s%> of <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> shall <S%H6213>yield<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1324>bath,<s%> and the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of a <S%H2563>homer<s%> shall <S%H6213>yield<s%> an <S%H374>ephah.<s%>

Woe <S%H1945><s%> unto them that rise up <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> that they may <S%H7291>follow<s%> strong <S%H7941>drink;<s%> that <S%H309>continue<s%> until <S%H5399>night,<s%> till <S%H3196>wine<s%> <S%H1814>inflame<s%> them!

And the <S%H3658>harp,<s%> and the <S%H5035>viol,<s%> the <S%H8596>tabret,<s%> and <S%H2485>pipe,<s%> and <S%H3196>wine,<s%> <S%H1961>are<s%> in their <S%H4960>feasts:<s%> but they <S%H5027>regard<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> the <S%H6467>work<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H7200>consider<s%> the <S%H4639>operation<s%> of his <S%H3027>hands.<s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> are gone into <S%H1540>captivity,<s%> because they have <S%H4480>no<s%> <S%H1097><s%> <S%H1847>knowledge:<s%> and their <S%H3519>honorable<s%> <S%H4962>men<s%> are <S%H7458>famished,<s%> and their <S%H1995>multitude<s%> dried <S%H6704>up<s%> with <S%H6772>thirst.<s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H7585>hell<s%> hath <S%H7337>enlarged<s%> <S%H5315>herself,<s%> and <S%H6473>opened<s%> her <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H1097>without<s%> <S%H2706>measure:<s%> and their <S%H1926>glory,<s%> and their <S%H1995>multitude,<s%> and their <S%H7588>pomp,<s%> and he that <S%H5938>rejoiceth,<s%> shall <S%H3381>descend<s%> into it.

And the mean <S%H120>man<s%> shall be brought <S%H7817>down,<s%> and the mighty <S%H376>man<s%> shall be <S%H8213>humbled,<s%> and the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H1364>lofty<s%> shall be humbled: <S%H8213><s%>

But the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> shall be <S%H1361>exalted<s%> in <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> and <S%H410>God<s%> that is <S%H6918>holy<s%> shall be <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> in <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>
Then shall the <S%H3532>lambs<s%> <S%H7462>feed<s%> after their <S%H1699>manner,<s%> and the waste <S%H2723>places<s%> of the fat <S%H4220>ones<s%> shall <S%H1481>strangers<s%> <S%H398>eat.<s%>
Woe <S%H1945><s%> unto them that <S%H4900>draw<s%> <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> with <S%H2256>cords<s%> of <S%H7723>vanity,<s%> and <S%H2402>sin<s%> as it were with a <S%H5699>cart<s%> rope: <S%H5688><s%>

That <S%H559>say,<s%> Let him make <S%H4116>speed,<s%> and <S%H2363>hasten<s%> his <S%H4639>work,<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> we may <S%H7200>see<s%> it: and let the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> draw <S%H7126>nigh<s%> and <S%H935>come,<s%> that we may <S%H3045>know<s%> it!

Woe <S%H1945><s%> unto them that <S%H559>call<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H2896>good,<s%> and <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H7451>evil;<s%> that <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H2822>darkness<s%> for <S%H216>light,<s%> and <S%H216>light<s%> for <S%H2822>darkness;<s%> that <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H4751>bitter<s%> for <S%H4966>sweet,<s%> and <S%H4966>sweet<s%> for <S%H4751>bitter!<s%>
Woe <S%H1945><s%> unto them that are <S%H2450>wise<s%> in their own <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H995>prudent<s%> <S%H5048>in<s%> their own <S%H6440>sight!<s%>
Woe <S%H1945><s%> unto them that are <S%H1368>mighty<s%> to <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine,<s%> and <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H2428>strength<s%> to <S%H4537>mingle<s%> strong drink: <S%H7941><s%>
Which <S%H6663>justify<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H6118>for<s%> <S%H7810>reward,<s%> and take <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> him!

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> as the <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H398>devoureth<s%> the <S%H7179>stubble,<s%> and the <S%H3852>flame<s%> <S%H7503>consumeth<s%> the <S%H2842>chaff,<s%> so their <S%H8328>root<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> as <S%H4716>rottenness,<s%> and their <S%H6525>blossom<s%> shall go <S%H5927>up<s%> as <S%H80>dust:<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they have cast <S%H3988>away<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> and <S%H5006>despised<s%> the <S%H565>word<s%> of the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> is the <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against his <S%H5971>people,<s%> and he hath stretched <S%H5186>forth<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> them, and hath <S%H5221>smitten<s%> them: and the <S%H2022>hills<s%> did <S%H7264>tremble,<s%> and their <S%H5038>carcasses<s%> were <S%H1961>torn<s%> <S%H5478><s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of the <S%H2351>streets.<s%> For <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> his <S%H639>anger<s%> is <S%H3808>not<s%> turned <S%H7725>away,<s%> but his <S%H3027>hand<s%> is stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> <S%H5750>still.<s%>

And he will lift <S%H5375>up<s%> an <S%H5251>ensign<s%> to the <S%H1471>nations<s%> from <S%H4480>far,<s%> <S%H7350><s%> and will <S%H8319>hiss<s%> unto them from the <S%H4480>end<s%> <S%H7097><s%> of the <S%H776>earth:<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> they shall <S%H935>come<s%> with <S%H4120>speed<s%> swiftly: <S%H7031><s%>

None <S%H369><s%> shall be <S%H5889>weary<s%> <S%H369>nor<s%> <S%H3782>stumble<s%> among them; <S%H3808>none<s%> shall <S%H5123>slumber<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H3462>sleep;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall the <S%H232>girdle<s%> of their <S%H2504>loins<s%> be <S%H6605>loosed,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> the <S%H8288>latchet<s%> of their <S%H5275>shoes<s%> be broken: <S%H5423><s%>

Whose <S%H834><s%> <S%H2671>arrows<s%> are <S%H8150>sharp,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H7198>bows<s%> <S%H1869>bent,<s%> their <S%H5483>horses'<s%> <S%H6541>hooves<s%> shall be <S%H2803>counted<s%> like <S%H6864>flint,<s%> and their <S%H1534>wheels<s%> like a whirlwind: <S%H5492><s%>

Their <S%H7581>roaring<s%> shall be like a <S%H3833>lion,<s%> they shall <S%H7580>roar<s%> like young <S%H3715>lions:<s%> yea, they shall <S%H5098>roar,<s%> and lay <S%H270>hold<s%> of the <S%H2964>prey,<s%> and shall carry it away <S%H6403>safe,<s%> and <S%H369>none<s%> shall <S%H5337>deliver<s%> it.

And in <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> they shall <S%H5098>roar<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> them like the <S%H5100>roaring<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea:<s%> and if one <S%H5027>look<s%> unto the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H2009>behold<s%> <S%H2822>darkness<s%> and <S%H6862>sorrow,<s%> and the <S%H216>light<s%> is <S%H2821>darkened<s%> in the <S%H6183>heavens<s%> thereof.
